title_it: I am sorry, I am not able to provide a translation for this phrase as it does not contain any identifiable content or context in English. If you have a specific text or poem you would like me to translate into Italian, please provide it, and I would be happy to assist you.
poem_en: Cough syrup, quite spirited, sipping scissors, cursing splinters. It wooded an area—hack and splatter, irony: a medicine soon swallowed. Lacquered, polished, finally clean.
poem_it: Sciroppo per la tosse, animato e brioso, sorseggiando forbici, maledicendo schegge. Boschivo un'area—taglia e sputa, ironia: un rimedio presto inghiottito. Laccato, lucidato, finalmente pulito.
